extends Trigger

      • setPolled

        public GestureTrigger setPolled(boolean polled)
        Description copied from interface: ITrigger
        Determines if this trigger is polled or not.
        Specified by:
        setPolled in interface ITrigger
        Overrides:
        setPolled in class Trigger
        Parameters:
        polled - if true this trigger will continue to fire as long as a certain event is occurring, else thr trigger will only be fire once when a certain event occurs
        Returns:
        this instance for chaining
